sentences.sContent: It’s clear that the author is a woman.
...The author dropped out of college some forty years ago...
...The author was happy to learn she could do some exams at home...
...The author thinks her friend made a rational decision in choosing a more hospitable place over an apparently elegant assisted living home...
...said the lead author of the study...
...Genuine criticism creates a precious opening for an author to become better on his own terms--a process that is often extremely painful...
...The author looks upon his mother as his most demanding and caring instructor...
...Constructive criticism gives an author a good start to improve his writing...
...The author was not much surprised when his school teacher marked his essay as "flawless"...
...The author was advised against the improper use of figures of speech...
...The author gradually improved his writing by avoiding fancy language...
